aiConfigModal.title: AI Service Not Configured
aiConfigModal.detecting: We detected you have not configured AI services yet. You just need to simply configure the AI service connection parameters to start playing!

recommended.title: Recommended: Baidu PaddlePaddle AI Studio / ModelScope / HuggingFace Free AI Services
recommended.bullet1: Free to use; register to obtain
recommended.bullet2: Supports vision recognition and image generation
recommended.bullet3: Click the Configure Now button, fill in Access Token to start playing
recommended.bullet4: Users in mainland China are recommended to use Baidu PaddlePaddle AI Studio or ModelScope, overseas users are recommended to use HuggingFace

aiConfigModal.disclaimer: Disclaimer: When you configure custom AI services, this game only provides a gaming platform and gameplay. The game serves solely as an interface channel for calling AI services you configure yourself, and does not engage in any secondary resale or distribution.
